content: add some texture and warmth to your kitchen with the bake me a pie pot holder it s beautiful and useful this pot holder is crocheted using the magic pot holder technique to create a double thick pot holder it works up in a few hours uses less than one skein of yarn and makes a wonderful gift for friends and family who doesn t love a pot holder > this pot holder pattern is week 2 of the ** pot holders galore crochet-along 1 ** with the purchase of the ebook you will receive a total of 6 pot holder patterns one pattern every week during the crochet-along on week 5 there will 2 pot holder patterns available however the free pattern with ads and video tutorial are linked below what can i use a pot holder for pot holders are practical items that you can use in the kitchen * set a scolding pot/pan/baking sheet/casserole dish on a pot holder to protect your counters and furniture * use them like oven mitts when taking something out of the oven or microwave * use them as a portable placemat place a pot holder underneath a hot bowl or plate so you can carry your food to the table or the couch * use them as a coaster for hot drinks > the free pattern for the bake me a pie pot holder can be found ** here 2 ** > the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 3 ** skill level advanced beginner / intermediate language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitch chain slip_stitch single_crochet spike size 6 5 wide x 6 5 long instructions are included to customize the size of your pot holder > materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * 112 yds / 102 m of any medium 4 worsted weight cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * stitch marker or safety pin i hope you enjoy making your pot holders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pot-holder-galore-cal 2 https //thispixiecreates com/week-2-pot-holders-galore-cal-bake-me-a-pie/ 3 https //youtu be/5pxr0hoejue
